statements: SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_phone IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM customers LIMIT 5 OFFSET 3;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Smith' OR customer_name = 'Alice Johnson';
SELECT customer_id, customer_email, purchase_history FROM customers WHERE customer_id BETWEEN 2 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL
SELECT customer_name, last_purchase_date FROM customers WHERE last_purchase_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, quantity FROM purchases WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE last_purchase_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_purchases FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_purchases > 2;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM purchases WHERE product_id = 123);
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, address FROM Customers WHERE email = 'example@example.com';
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM Orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE address LIKE 'New%';
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY category, product_name DESC;
SELECT c.customer_name, o.order_date, p.product_name FROM Customers c JOIN Orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN Products p ON p.category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_purchases FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT prediction_date, predicted_demand FROM predictions WHERE predicted_demand > 100;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC, email ASC;
SELECT customer_id, name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT customer_id, name FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT c.name AS customer_name, p.product_name AS purchased_product FROM customers c JOIN purchases pu ON c.customer_id = pu.customer_id JOIN products p ON pu.product_id = p.product_id;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY unit_price DESC
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, registration_date FROM customers ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT customer_name, total_purchases FROM customers ORDER BY total_purchases DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT c.customer_name, p.product_name, o.quantity FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE total_purchases > 1000 ORDER BY customer_name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_name, price, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND price BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY price DESC

SELECT c.customer_name, p.product_name, o.order_date FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id WHERE o.quantity > 5 ORDER BY o.order_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_name, SUM(total_purchases) AS total_spent FROM customers GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_spent > 5000 ORDER BY total_spent DESC

SELECT p.product_name, SUM(pr.predicted_quantity) AS total_predictions FROM products p JOIN predictions pr ON p.product_id = pr.product_id GROUP BY p.product_name ORDER BY total_predictions DESC LIMIT 3
